author: Digix Holdings
title: Contract to claim voting results
name: DaoSpecialVotingClaims

inputs.name: _key
inputs.description: the resolver key to look up

abiDocs.name: get_contract
abiDocs.details: Get the address of a contract

abiDocs.name: currentTimeInQuarter

outputs.name: _currentT
outputs.description: the current relative time in the quarter

abiDocs.details: For example: the currentTimeInQuarter of the first second of any quarter is 1
abiDocs.return: _currentT the current relative time in the quarter
abiDocs.notice: Get the current relative time in the quarter

abiDocs.name: claimSpecialProposalVotingResult

outputs.name: _passed
outputs.description: Boolean, true if voting passed, throw if failed, returns false if passed deadline

abiDocs.return: { "_passed": "Boolean, true if voting passed, throw if failed, returns false if passed deadline" }
abiDocs.notice: Function to claim the voting result on special proposal

abiDocs.name: isMainPhase

outputs.name: _isMainPhase
outputs.description: true if it is in a main phase

abiDocs.details: The main phase is where all the governance activities could take plase. If the DAO is replaced, there can never be any more main phase.
abiDocs.return: _isMainPhase true if it is in a main phase
abiDocs.notice: Check if it is currently in a main phase.

abiDocs.name: isLockingPhase

outputs.name: _isLockingPhase
outputs.description: true if it is in the locking phase

abiDocs.details: No governance activities can happen in the locking phase. The locking phase is from t=0 to t=CONFIG_LOCKING_PHASE_DURATION-1
abiDocs.return: _isLockingPhase true if it is in the locking phase
abiDocs.notice: Check if it is currently in the locking phase

abiDocs.name: isParticipant
abiDocs.notice: Check if a user is a participant in the current quarter

abiDocs.name: isDaoNotReplaced

outputs.name: _isNotReplaced
outputs.description: true if it is not replaced, false if it has already been replaced

abiDocs.return: _isNotReplaced true if it is not replaced, false if it has already been replaced
abiDocs.notice: Check if the DAO contracts have been replaced by a new set of contracts

abiDocs.name: isProposalPaused

outputs.name: _isPausedOrStopped
outputs.description: true if the proposal is paused(or stopped)

abiDocs.details: If a proposal is paused/stopped (by the PRLs): proposer cannot call for voting, a current on-going voting round can still pass, but no funding can be withdrawn.A paused proposal can still be unpausedIf a proposal is stopped, this function also returns true
abiDocs.return: _isPausedOrStopped true if the proposal is paused(or stopped)
abiDocs.notice: Check if a proposal is currently paused/stopped

abiDocs.name: isModerator
abiDocs.notice: Check if a user is a moderator in the current quarter
